fields.comment: the name of the item
fields.name: item_name

fields.comment: does this item stack on other items the same 'item_name' in the inventory?
fields.name: is_stackable

fields.comment: if 1, using this item will reduce 'uses_remaining'. When it reaches zero the item is destroyed
fields.name: is_consumable

fields.comment: does this count as an item that was picked up in the stats
fields.name: stats_count_as_item_pick_up

fields.comment: if 1, item will be automatically picked up, no pickup hint is shown
fields.name: auto_pickup

fields.comment: if 1, this item can't be removed from a container once it is put inside one
fields.name: permanently_attached

fields.comment: how many times can this item be used? -1 = unlimited, will be reset to gun_actions.lua max_uses by inventorygui_system, -2 = unlimited unlimited
fields.name: uses_remaining

fields.comment: is it known what this item does?
fields.name: is_identified

fields.comment: if 1, this item can't be modified or moved from a wand
fields.name: is_frozen

fields.comment: does player keep this item when respawning?
fields.name: collect_nondefault_actions

fields.comment: is this entity destroyed when it's in an inventory and the inventory owner dies?
fields.name: remove_on_death

fields.comment: is this entity destroyed when it's in an inventory, empty and the inventory owner dies?
fields.name: remove_on_death_if_empty

fields.comment: if true, the default AbilityComponent.child_actions in this items will be removed when it dies
fields.name: remove_default_child_actions_on_death

fields.comment: if 1, the item will play a hovering animation
fields.name: play_hover_animation

fields.comment: if 1, the item will play a spinning animation, if player_hover_animation is 0
fields.name: play_spinning_animation

fields.comment: if 1, the default logic for determining if an item can be equiped in inventory is overridden and this can be always equipped
fields.name: is_equipable_forced

fields.comment: if 1, plays a default sound when picked
fields.name: play_pick_sound

fields.comment: if 0 you cannot drink this, default is 1, because that's how it was implemented and backwards compatibility
fields.name: drinkable

fields.comment: the position where this item spawned
fields.name: spawn_pos

fields.comment: number of items this can hold inside itself. TODO: get rid of all uses of 'ability->gun_config.deck_capacity' and replace them with this!
fields.name: max_child_items

fields.comment: sprite displayed for the item in various UIs. If not empty overrides sprites declared by Ability and ItemAction
fields.name: ui_sprite

fields.comment: item description displayed in various UIs
fields.name: ui_description

fields.comment: Which inventory do we go to when we're picked up, if it's not full.
fields.name: preferred_inventory

fields.comment: if set, this is used for the 'Press $0 to pick $1' message
fields.name: custom_pickup_string

fields.comment: our preferred slot (x,y) in the inventory
fields.name: inventory_slot

fields.comment: NPC have their own next_frame_pickable, because this is used to make NPCs not pick up gold, which also meant player couldn't pick up that gold
fields.name: npc_next_frame_pickable

fields.comment: can this be picked up and placed on someone's inventory
fields.name: is_pickable

fields.comment: to override the weirdness that is is_pickable, which affects if this is hittable or not. If true, will always be hittable regardless of is_pickable
fields.name: is_hittable_always

fields.comment: how many pixels away can this item be picked up from
fields.name: item_pickup_radius

fields.comment: how far can we move the camera from the player when this item is equipped
fields.name: camera_max_distance

fields.comment: how quickly does the camera follow player?
fields.name: camera_smooth_speed_multiplier
